name: Sha Ek
description: '''Chalim Perry''' (born April 8, 2003), professionally known as '''Sha EK (Sha Everything Killed/Killer)''', is an American rapper from [[the Bronx]], [[New York City|New York]]. He is signed to [[Warner Music Group|Warner Music]] and [[Defiant Records]]. He released his major label debut mixtape, ''Face of the What'', on September 2, 2022.
